SEARCH
Module io.inverno.mod.grpc.client
Package io.inverno.mod.grpc.client

Interface GrpcClient.CloseableStub<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends GrpcClient.Stub<A,B>>

Type Parameters:
A - the exchange context type
B - the stub type
All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, GrpcClient.Stub<A,B>
Enclosing interface:
GrpcClient
public static interface GrpcClient.CloseableStub<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends GrpcClient.Stub<A,B>> extends GrpcClient.Stub<A,B>, AutoCloseable

A closeable gRPC client stub definition.

This is intended to be used when generating gRPC client stub from Protocol buffer definitions.

Since:
1.12
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    close()
    Subscribes to shutdownGracefully() in order to eventually close the underlying endpoint.
    Mono<Void>
    shutdown()
    Shutdowns the underlying endpoint right away.
    Mono<Void>

    Gracefully shutdown the underlying endpoint.

    Methods inherited from interface io.inverno.mod.grpc.client.GrpcClient.Stub

    withMetadata

  • Method Details

    • close

      default void close()

      Subscribes to shutdownGracefully() in order to eventually close the underlying endpoint.

      This method should return right away before the endpoint is actually closed, you should prefer shutdown() or shutdownGracefully() to control when the endpoint is actually closed.

      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable

    • shutdown

      Mono<Void> shutdown()

      Shutdowns the underlying endpoint right away.

      Returns:
      a mono which completes once the underlying endpoint is shutdown

    • shutdownGracefully

      Mono<Void> shutdownGracefully()

      Gracefully shutdown the underlying endpoint.

      Returns:
      a mono which completes once the underlying endpoint is shutdown
